website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight and portable nail drill features a handy LED light to illuminate your nails as you work.
pros: Stands out for its dust shield and LED light, two useful features that enhance home manicure tasks
Quick and easy to adjust the speed and rotation direction
Includes 8 quality attachments and a storage case
cons: There is a bit of a learning curve to using some of the components

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for client!
customer_reviews.text: I take care of older people and one of my clients had extremely long and thick toenails. I definitely did not feel comfortable using anything sharp to cut them. This tool was absolutely perfect! It was strong enough to get through those bad boys and thin them down.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE. IT'S  FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I read all reviews and it seems to me such a nice product I decided to order. Instead of good quality manicure set I got something cheap and fake. You can look at photos and see there is anything the same I ordered. Missing parts, dirty and fake! NEVER AGAIN I WILL ORDER THAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Taking better care of my feet is my New Year's resolution for 2018. For the cost of one pedicure at a salon, I can do a better job myself anytime at home with this machine. Also, I don't have to endure embarrassment from pedicurists who don't understand my runner's feet which currently are missing 3 toenails. (Hideous, actually. Without nail polish on the skin, the toes look like slugs). My heels, which had thick callouses, are now baby-soft, and thickened toenails have been thinned out. My feet look a lot better after having used this machine three times in the week I've owned it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: The electric manicure kit appears to be doing the job of grinding back a thickened toenail. I was glad that I read the reviews about these products before I purchased anything, and can endorse the statement to only buy units that plug into the electricity supply, and do not reply on batteries. It is not easy to use on yourself, and it would be best operated by a skilled friend, if you can find one.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: toenails
customer_reviews.text: my husband has thick toenail fungus...this kit is useless on his toes....I'm trying to return it...guess I've waited to long....I tried several more attachments today on his toes...they do nothing to trim them....his toenails are too thick
customer_reviews.author: Alaine C. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Design
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this Manicure set, but I can't get the cord to stay attached to the unit. I use it very close to an electrical outlet and with no tension at all on the cord, it just falls right out!!!! Ugh!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my “new” Beurer Mani/Pedi kit and the handle is dirty and scratched. I think I got a used product. Very disappointing since I got this to do clean, sanitary manicures at home.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Hill

customer_reviews.title: Bits do not lock in!
customer_reviews.text: The bits do not lock in and start moving out as you use it. So it is basically useless as you have no control. Will return
customer_reviews.author: HITS 1

customer_reviews.title: HUH, IT DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: The bits won't stay in place! I saw a few other reviewers say the same thing, and I thought they were out of their minds. Who would make a product like this and make it so that the bits do not securely click into place. But, no, that is a real thing! The product is unusable. Unbelievable. A gigantic waste of my time. I don't like having to buy things to return them. My time is worth more than that. The unbelievable arrogance to make a product without testing it. Or they tested it and didn't care that the bits don't stay in place. Absolutely astonishing. Any review on here that's positive has to be paid for. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: read carefully

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Worth the purchase price. The size fits nicely in your hand, and light. Cordless makes it easy to maneuver and portable; nice not to have to worry about plugs and cords. The buttons are simple, and the speed settings allows just enough rotations to remove layers without being too fast as to allow heat buildup on the skin. The light is also helpful; you can see its working. I didn't realize it, but also comes with a dust cover to prevent debris from becoming airborne. All in all, I'm very satisfied with my purchase. Wish I bought one long ago when I used to use a rotary tool from my toolbox!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This manicure/pedicure device works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this manicure and pedicure kit especially for toe nails that are too thick due to former damage. For years my thick nails have prevented me from wearing sandals without embarrassment. After using the device just once, my toenails are now flattened and so when polish is put on them, they look normal. I am thrilled to have this device with all the different tips. I did not realize it has a light as well which helps me to see more clearly. The device is lightweight, quiet, and stable. I like that I could change the speed. I am so grateful it is as good as it says.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Miller

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I find this product so difficult to use because the pieces to the drill don’t click in and stay put. Every time I tip the drill downward my drill piece fall out and I have to turn the drill on, replace the drill bit and get started again. Worst product and so difficult to use!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne dagen

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great tool, but the bits do not stay in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my new nail gadget!!! Having fungus nails is not great, but having an easier way to maintain them has made my day. I searched all the models in the marketplace & chose this manufacturer. A professional unit from others was not cost effective, this one was a reasonable price. Fungus nails are thick with broken edges and "crud" buildup at the tips. Options were cuticle chemicals which can burn skin and can't be used very often. Regular flat nail files & nail blocks abrade the good tissue/nail while not often touching the fungus areas. Plus... its just plain hard work! I'm doing a happy dance & I haven't even tried all the tips yet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: is the best, specially if your toe nails are losing their ...
customer_reviews.text: I have buy 3 sets of manicure and pedicure kits. The Beurer MP62, is the best, specially if your toe nails are losing their shape. My toe nails look much better now. I love this kit, I recommend it a hundred per cent !
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: All you need for at home manicure.
customer_reviews.text: At home manicure is much easier with this set. It is excact copy of the German set my mom has. You have to know what you are doing and how to use it. I would not recommend it for novice unless you will be super careful and use only low speed. It is possible to ruin you nail bed and to burn your skin on very high speed. Very easy and comfortable to use. Manicure will look more professional, many attachments and settings. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this kit
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this kit, perfect for footwork. I tried a manicure once with it but found it too powerful for my hand nails ....and it was a bit much.... But I love what it does for my feet. It's addressed issues that a normal file would not do, or would take too much work to do. Anyways I only really wanted it for me feet so it was exactly what I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.author: Stam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with this nail care product. Love all the attachments and the long cord. It's very easy to use. I would like to have a 2nd set of some attachments so I don't have to use same ones on fingernails as on toenails My only problem is some of the attachments don't stay in while using them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Very good Manicure / Pedicure Tool
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for a home manicure or pedicure. At 1st it was tricky to know which tips to use at what speed and at what angle to hold the device, but with a little practice it got much easier. My nails grow very fast and I use this mainly to file my nails down, then I use a nail file to get the corners how I like. I'm sure with more practice I'll be able to just use the device. The speeds available surprised me as did the power. I've had battery operated units that were terrible in comparison. I'll never own those again now that I've had this unit. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: You get "Good Husband Points" with this one
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this all the time and loves it. She has issue with her Arthritic hands so this is really a great item. This allows her to maintain her nails and made me a lot of "Good Husband" points. All of you husbands know that "Good Husband" they are valued items.
customer_reviews.author: Tb2k82CE

customer_reviews.title: Beurer Cordless Manicure does the job
customer_reviews.text: Beurer Cordless Manicure is a lite and easy to maneuver. This powerful cordless provides the movability not provided in corded types. Plus it comes with all the attachments to accomplish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Scott

customer_reviews.title: Liked👍
customer_reviews.text: +- a good set but it’s not clear why additional nozzles need to be ordered separately on the official website.?!?! why you can not choose on Amazon if you need nozzles !??
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to find your Pedicure Kit. It has all the atributes that I have been looking for, including the fact that it is cordless and uses rechargeable batteries. Cords are very difficult to deal with when you are working on your toes and always seem to get in the way. Disposable dry cell batteries tend to leak and do not have the power and convenience of rechargeables.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. 🤨
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for two months and already it’s shorting out and is well on its way to dying. Don’t waste your money...
customer_reviews.author: Damian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: JUST got this today, and already used it! It is just what I needed to grind down toenails that were thickened from repeated trauma in hiking boots! I used to spend a long time cutting them down, then hand filing them down. This powerful nail drill took care of each nail in record time! It does not bog down, the lighted end is great, the adjustable speed is great, it is easy to hold. The cord is limiting, but a power strip will take care of that. Everything fit back in the case fine, even the stretched-out cord. I recommend it highly! (Do clean the attachments with alcohol afterward to keep it sanitary)
customer_reviews.author: VVV

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The high speed is great on tough areas and calluses. Slower speeds for more precise work or on more sensitive skin. A very nice selection of drill bits. I like this much better than my previous device which was battery operated and often slowed down under use, especially if any pressure is applied. The high speed available with this device, because of the plug-in powe, overcomes the sluggishness my battery unit had. The battery of my old one would become exhausted after a few uses. Very nice. Steve Edit: (5/28/19) I was offered a battery charger if I wrote this review. It never arrived, though the review was posted almost immediately. Changing review to two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great drill!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect drill! Worth the money. I purchased this to start doing my own nails during the covid crisis. Although I am still waiting for other supplies to do my acrylics, I decided to file my fingers and toes. When I read the instructions and that some bits are for ingrown toe nails, I went to town. these little bits are miracle workers! Super happy I bought this. If your hesitant about the price, this is one of those "quality" purchases. You will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Katilyn hofmann

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely fabulous set. Even though I get biweekly mani/pedi's, I prefer trimming and shaping my nails myself and this set is perfect. Well worth the price, especially since it is electrical (as opposed to the flimsy battery-operated sets out there). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KDC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a product like this for the last 10 years had one like it in Germany and all previous electric mani-pedicure sets never did it like this product! I am so happy to finally do my mani-and pedicure as I used!! Would not exchange it for any other product like it! LOOOOOOOOOOVE IT!!!!!! You want to do a great job on you or someone else... this is it! AND you can adjust the speed to be more careful to protect from beginners discomforts.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Nice electric system
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for! I had an older manicure system from a different company, it quit working so I bought a rechargeable one. It was awful. The Beurer fits nicely in the hand. The attachments are well made, does not appear to have any plastic parts. Love the variable speed and directions. The light will take a little to get use to. The cord is a good length. The system packs away nicely and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Doria K. Hairston

customer_reviews.title: So much better than battery-operated systems!
customer_reviews.text: This set works great for me. I bought a similar product for my mom, a different brand comparable in price but this one seems to have more power. It doesn't hang up or stop as much as my mom's. I wish I'd known that before! This cuts thick, tough toenails easily, sands uneven nails perfectly. The polishing attachment is a plus. Storage case is convenient since there's so many pieces. The battery-operated systems can't hold a candle to this one!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Wilmot

customer_reviews.title: A must have tool
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for the Professional Manicure Home-System. I have gone to small salons and paid $ 20.00 to $0.00 dollars to get my nails and feet done. I did not know whether the tools were clean from one persons feet to another. I decided to do my own feet and hands, and then I will know who used the tools. (myself). This is how you get fungus on your toe nails, the tools are not steril from one person to the next. Thanks so much for the set.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Morten

customer_reviews.title: Love this set at first then 😢😫
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed like the perfect manicure set for myself and my husband. He has super thick toe nails and my finger nails are thin and my nails break easily. This set was easy to use at low and high speed. But after a few months it would no longer hold a charge. Very disappointed. Only used a few times. Very expensive for something that only works correctly for a few mo the. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MMLLL Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Made Where?!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, and so far, I love it. Well-made. Lots of attachments. Light. Dust shield. Everything I wanted. Useful instructions. Would have given it 5 Stars if not for the misleading info on where it’s made. Name on the box reads BEURER GERMANY. Manufacturer reads BEURER NORTH AMERICA. Info on side of box reads MADE IN CHINA. Which one is it? It can’t be all 3 countries. ..... Too bad, because a dishonest statement of where it’s made cost it a Star. Deliberately confusing info on an otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. MCGUIRE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and smoothly attach all the accessories. I was little hesitant to purchase a bit more expensive drill, cause I needed something small and easy to carry around, but strong at the same time. I’m very satisfied with beurer. Comes in nice white case. I’m sure my boyfriend enjoyed his first treatment ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Enéh

customer_reviews.title: Good product, maybe a little expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it works well. It is nice to have the plug, and not always be changing batteries. The carrying case is also helpful. The attachments seem to be high-quality metal. You do need to use a light touch with the metal ones on natural nails. I do wish it came with a better cuticle removal attachment. My old battery-operated one had an attachment that was angled and made of pumice stone which worked a little better and didn’t tear up natural nails. The price seems a little high for what you get. I’ll update my review if anything changes as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Fishy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had a pedicure a few years ago and developed a nail fungus from that one visit! Tried so many products to get rid of it, and tried to file down the thickness of those nails. Got a new podiatrist and a new topical medicine that works best if nails are ground thinner so I researched and chose Beurer set. Used it first time last night and I LOVE it! Easy to use and my nails look better today than they have in a long time. I give this FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.author: TDWilson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We like this set but I wish they would include spaces for the attachments in the main holder. You have to put half of them in a plastic box if you don't want them loose. This box is annoying and if you have arthritic hands somewhat difficult and inconvenient to open. I think I will take the molded plastic base and just put the tools in the zippered case, leaving them loose. Power seems good and the attachments are as described.
customer_reviews.author: Christy B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Gel Nails
customer_reviews.text: During this Coronavirus quarantine, my nails have gotten out of hand. I typically go to the nail salon every two - three weeks for refill and a pedicure, but not possible at this time. I was able to file down and clean up my nails handily using this product. It comes with detailed instructions and information, and I found it easy to use. My nails are now shorter and smoother! I also used the grinder to work on my heels with success! I am very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: JoanieNTX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your nails
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a birthday gift. She’s absolutely obsessed with her nails and she’s always trying these new things so I thought this would be perfect for her and I was right! She loves it so much and uses it all the time. She loves that it comes with so many different attachments so she can get her nails looking perfect. She hasn’t even been to the nail salon since she’s gotten it.
customer_reviews.author: meibellvictoria

customer_reviews.title: You can do this!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, all you chickadee's with overdue manicures due to the current quarantine THIS device is the BOMB! I was so intimated by this tiny device, fearing I would lose nail & skin with lots of blood (I envision...lol Since my salon visit was way overdue (nails on Feb12th) I had to something!! I bite the bullet and turned it on and wow! by the 2nd nail, I had it down. once I got the spin, direction & motion synced it worked like a professional! I feel like wonder woman!!
customer_reviews.author: Rockcybele

customer_reviews.title: More CONS than PROS
customer_reviews.text: Pros:For beginner easy enough to use and has a light on the end Cons: no replacement drill bits available (product drill bit on the left and industry standard replacement on the right in picture); 3/32 bits do not work as this e-file has a notch that is needed on the drill bit for it to stay put and the speed adjuster on the handle can be easily pushed during use.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Thinned my thick toenails in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: It comes in its own zippered case and each part fits perfectly. Its very easy to use and adjust. I did my thick fungus toenails in about 30 minutes using the specific tools provided. Its a great product, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elana Kaloyerakis

customer_reviews.title: No power
customer_reviews.text: This has no power at all. Sent back. I have gel polish on and it won’t take it off. My old nail genie would, but that died after 11 years. Ordered another nail genie.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy  Lanocka

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for nails. I used it to take off false nails without destroying my finger nail.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Gotch

customer_reviews.title: Best for fungal nails treatment.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing else has been working for me for the past 6 years. The trick is to get the white parts off and then treat the nail. This is also great for “opening” the nail to allow the solution to penetrate.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great money saver!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard a lot of people talking about tools like this and I wanted to start doing my own mani’s and pedi’s so I decided to purchase this one. I’m glad i chose this one because It’s very beginner friendly and it’s very easy to switch between attachments and manuevering between speeds and btw it comes with a description of each attachment! I’m saving money by doing my own nails now , I love it this product!
customer_reviews.author: K Lake

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: I needed an electric filer for a deformed toenail from a botched surgical removal that didn't grow back properly. I have tried this and it has worked at smoothing it down. Also have other toenails that have a fungus that stops their growth. This helps rough up the surface, so liquid medicine can penetrate better. Also helps file down small thick toenails that are hard to cut. So far this device is doing what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, takes some practice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product when my toenails became very thick and difficult to clip, shape, and generally keep respectable. The drill took some time to get used to (I've been using emery boards my entire life), so the first few times was basically just practice. I think I have the hang of it now. I don't particularly care for the LED lights as it tends to shine towards my eyes instead of the nail, but I can live with that. Overall, with practice, this is a good tool to take care of your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler now so going to the salon is taking away from my precious down time. I do however have time to use this tool in my home. I used to get mani-pedis religiously until having a baby. My feet were paying the price! As well as my fingers with hang nails and cracking/peeling skin from the winter months and so many dishes! My feet are so smooth after one use! Works wonders!!! Also, very nice for getting my hands feeling smooth again, buffing away any skin or nail that could have hurt the baby. I don't know how I ever lived without this product! Buying for family members for gifts! Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.author: Larina Weber

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tool, but it doesn't hold a charge, and it's very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Great mani pedi grooming set. Still learning how to use it but so far so good 😊. It comes with a travel case so easy to store and to take places! I can see having this for a girls weekend with my 3 daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Beurer Variable Speed Professionsl Manicure /Pedicure Machine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Beurer Variable Speed Manicure Set and love it. One of the reasons I chose this was the fact that the drill/sanding, buffing attachments were all metal and not plastic that could easily break. Also love the variable speed. Comes complete with 10 nail attachments as well as 10 sanding bands. Easy operation and compact case.
customer_reviews.author: Irene S. Landan

customer_reviews.title: Great way to file nails!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 electric nail files so far. One was a very inexpensive one given to me. It quickly died. Another one I bought after that first one and it lasted for about 3 years. This one by Beurer is the best one yet! It comes with lots of files for different needs, has a shield and even has a light so that you can see what you're doing. Unfortunately, I have a couple of thick nails and so I prefer not to use manual clippers. This is perfect for that use and to use on all of my nails!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend! Super easy to use and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine... I don’t know how I never purchase it before! It’s super easy to use, doesn’t hurt your skin and you can make and amazing manicure and pedicure by yourself... I always did my nails at home and I use to hate cutting my cuticles and now I don’t have to and they look amazing!!! I’m sad that I didn’t make a before and after pictures to tell the difference! I strongly recommend this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn Malave

customer_reviews.title: Not for acrylics, hard gels, polygels etc. Good for mani/pedi only
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for what it is intended for Mani/pedi NOT for acrylics, hard gels, polygels etc. Although it has 7 speeds it is not very strong so it is great for natural nails. The price isn’t bad but you could get a better drill for a little more that would function the same and have he capability to work with acrylics etc. I purchased another drill that works for everything for just a little more and gifted this to my mom
customer_reviews.author: N. Stickles

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews before buying this Beurer manicure kit. I didn't know whether to buy the 10 speed or the Beurer, which had pretty good reviews. I took a chance and bought the Beurer. It is perfect. In case you are, like me, wondering about the speed, don't worry. This kit has 2 speeds and is very powerful. I use the slower speed on my gel nails and it works just fine. The light is so handy. There are attachments for anything you need for nails or toes. And the cord length, if you stretch it, will reach the floor for doing toenails. This set is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mad One

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great to help reduce thickened toenails
customer_reviews.text: I always thought I was struggling with ugly toenail fungus. Saw a podiatrist and they advised that the pressure from my shoes was causing thickened toe nails and advised I get something to help reduce that. It took me 3 years but I finally did it and it makes a difference from appearance and comfort level. This product, while on the higher price point, works beautifully, is well made and cordless. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heike Nuhsbaum

customer_reviews.title: Feet never looked so great
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, wonderfull product, once you learn all the ways to use this. My feet look and feel great. I use to, smooth nails after triming. Works great for corns and callusus. I use this on my heals, and callus on the ball of my foot, then soak my feet with a water/vinigar mix, then moistuize.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Works very well at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my dogs' nails and it's done a great job. For the cost of three trips to the groomer we can trim our dogs' nails ourselves at home. With the built in light and dust shield it's perfect for our pups' nails using the drum sander, and the other attachments are perfect for us to use on our own nails - which my wife and daughter have loved. It's powerful and well built, and I'd gladly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L

customer_reviews.title: Two Issues To Consider
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with an electric nail drill so I cannot compare it to others I have tried. I am happy with my purchase but there are 2 issues I wanted to share with shoppers and the company. 1) The light does not shine in the right directing to be of any use. It hinders viability. I covered it with a piece of black tape 2) The Power Switch: The power switch is off in the middle with spin direction to either side. They are so close together that the switch easily slips to the opposite direction, bypassing off, when attempting to turn it off. Multiple attempts required to turn the unit off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this long ago. I love it. The storage case is sturdy. I like the way it’s organized. The handheld part is a perfect size for my hand. I’ve used several attachments and all worked well. I have heel and toe calluses the large sapphire cone worked well on w/o causing pain. I would repurchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used these to trim my elderly father's neglected nails
customer_reviews.text: My dad's fingernails were neglected and grew repulsively long. He complained it was painful if I tried to clip his nails but I was able to uses this item to file them down. They were so thick that it still took a long time, but finally his nails are normal and manageable again. I am actually really thankful that this product worked. I was really worried one of his 3 to 4 inch long nails would get caught on something and be torn off painfully. Now, I don't have to worry about that anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Tenacious DJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for toes
customer_reviews.text: I have my nails done at a salon every 2-3 weeks but for whatever reason, I have always disliked having my toenails cut by someone else. While other women often love having pedicures, I am miserable at the thought. - On the other hand, I have to contort into a puzzle to cut them myself. LOL - This drill product is the best solution possible! --I have used it 2-3 times and it seems sturdy...and I know it is easy to switch different drill bits depending on what I want to accomplish. I thought the price was a bit high...but I am VERY happy I bought it. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn In Houston, TXTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment for at home nails
customer_reviews.text: This is great buy as it has been a great money saver for me. I rarely go to the nail salon now because this set does the job beautiful. It has everything you need to shed the outer layer of your nail, file, and clean under and around the nail and since it is electric it makes it that more efficient. I like that it has different settings for speed and turns both ways. It also comes with a great carrying case. It is a little large for travel, but good for storage. I’ve been using it for over a year now, it has not broken at all and it’s been a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Hak

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've used a cordless Manicure/Pedicure device for a number of years and decided to move up to a wired connection in order to get a little more power and control. The difference has been night and day. This unit provides you with fingertip control of the motor speed and ten different attachments to provide an answer for every nail challenge. I know one or more of these will make an appearance under the tree this year.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Budd

customer_reviews.title: Rotary nail file that does not work.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work,it must be plugged in to an electrical outlet to work. DON'T BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Temple

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It simple works.
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick (due to fungus) toenails. It's taken some time, but my nails are now in good shape. I used several of the attachments to get the job done. My nails no longer get stuck on my socks. Have not tried on my fingers yet, but will. My wife has used it on both fingers and toes. She loves it. She's removed all the ridges on her nails. The fingernail and toenail polish looks the best it has in years. My wife and I are both in our 80's. We love the "headlights".
customer_reviews.author: Buster Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: Listen, this would be perfect. But the grit on these tips are NOT very good. I had a very hard time doing my nails. I do poly gel and acrylic and I could not use this on EITHER. So I’m I a little sad I spent the amount I did here. Maybe I got the lemon? I’m going to order tips from a site I usually use and see if I can use them with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Rat

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I can stop the spindle bare handed. No torque. I was looking for something with a slower RPM, but a motor that can grind with enough torque.
customer_reviews.author: jvargas454

customer_reviews.title: USELESS and lack of helpful instructions
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand how to use....poor instruction....resorted back to clippers as this crap doesn't cut nails. Tried seeking video help....USELESS
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time and I love it. I have really good nails and always do my own manicure, some people have even thought my nails were fake as I am very lucky to have strong nails. But that makes them harder to file. This kit really did a great job. I'm sure there will be a learning curve and expect that I can get better using at using them. On by the way, my hair is awful, so that is my trade off for getting good nails.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kennedy-Luce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for callused heels!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for removing rough, cracked and dry calluses on heels. I was tired of going to get professional pedicures and paying for them to remove the callusses on my heels, but barely doing anything! This tool really works, even on the thickest nastiest heels! It’s just takes a little more time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review for 7-Piece model
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very sturdy & good quality machine. It's powerful so test it on the lower setting before the high one. Cons: The springy coil makes it difficult for me to use with my left hand & its also pretty thick which can be somewhat uncomfortable. Sidenote: Make sure to read the description. The incorrect model was described. This review is for the 7-piece model not the 10-piece. I did not receive a dust shield, there is no light on my model nor any shaving bands included. Overall: Good product for the price & I would recommend it if you're into self grooming.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: I just wished it had a slower speed
customer_reviews.text: it is a very nice product. I like it but there are some reasons that I give this product 3 starts. First, it goes to high speed but doesn't have a very slow speed which hurt specially when you want to use it around the edges. Second, it is very expensive for what you get. I don't want to say that it is not a good product, but it does do the same thing as others. But it comes with a very cool organizer which is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Delaram Mousavi

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏾🖕👎🏾🖕 not worth a dime. Appears made in China...not Germany.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely false advertising! Basically for feet or acrylic nails. Not made for natural nails. Returned. Wasted my time.
customer_reviews.author: icarus anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband gifted me for my birthday with this Beurer mani&pedi kit. It is a-m-a-z-i-n-g! I used it one time only ( yet), and I am more than trilled! I have a profi mani/pedicure in the comfort of my dinning room! It is easy to use it, looks good, fancy. The quality is good, we are talking about a German product, And we all know that German product IS a German product! Pure and simple!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this drill. I do my own nails at home and this is very easy to use. I also love that it is cordless because then your not stuck to doing your nails in one spot or being connected to a cord. The battery life is also very good I can do my nails at least two times off one charge.I have had mine for a few months now and the only complaint I have is now that I have used it so much it is noisier and sometimes makes a mound grinding noise when I first turn it on, this usually stops though. It still works great though and I would highly recommend to anyone especially at home nails.
customer_reviews.author: cecilya whitlock

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the Beurer manicure and pedicure device.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used an electric manicure and pedicure unit. I have used the battery powered ones. I also usually use a professional to do my nails. I had read the reviews and decided to try this unit. I gave it 5 stars. I found the device to be user friendly and the directions were easy to follow. The unit is powerful and I am very happy with the results. I highly recommend this device, especially for the quality of the unit and price. Beurer also has other devices that are worth checking out.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that might improve this wonderful product is the possibility of some kind of extension-device to make it easier for me to use on my toenails (I'm old, and I have fibromyalgia, so I'm not so limber as I used to be!). Otherwise this kit is very nearly perfect. Via an insert in the case, Beurer offers a free MINI-MASSAGER for reviewing this product and sending them a link with customer's shipping address. HAH! The address on the insert (info@beurer.com) is not a valid address. There's only a tenuous possibility that any message(s) sent them via their "did you find what you were looking for" section actually reaches the correct destination to fulfill above offer. Hmmmmmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Queenant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I usually get my nails done every two weeks but it has become a little too pricey for me so I decided to invest in one of these kits to start doing my own nails. I’ve never really done my own nails so I was grateful that the manual explains what each attachment is for and where to use it. I’ve saved a lot from doing my own nails now and this kit has made it super easy for me – it paid for itself within the first 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Yasiel Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Made short work of dip nail removal
customer_reviews.text: Finally got some time 2 sit down and try my hand at dip nails I carefully watched technician do it for months. I purchased this set because reviews were great & included every tip I would need It's fantastic! 1.Strong motor 2.Feels great in either hand 3.Easy to use 4.Very nice carrying case 5. Great gift idea My dip job needs work, but this kit made it so much easier. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sqieke

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe for even children’s nails
customer_reviews.text: This electric file is fantastic! My nails and toes have never felt and looked better and I didn’t have to get dressed and go all the way to a salon! I love that the cord can stretch so that I can do my nails anywhere in the house. All of the attachments are easy to use and when used properly, as per the instructions, don’t hurt my skin. I also used the fine grit flat attachment to file my 3 month old son’s nails so that he doesn’t scratch himself. He hardly made a fuss over the noise and it didn’t hurt him at all! Totally worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Ai Liyah M. Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Well-made worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful little tool easy-to-hold I like the idea it has a light on it different speeds and the tools don't drop out as you're using them they fit snugly into the handle
customer_reviews.author: gary o

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended by our doctor to use an electric pedicure instrument ...
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by our doctor to use an electric pedicure instrument on our feet for better care..this has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Beurer Sander Set for manicures & pedicures
customer_reviews.text: Not able to get needed pedicures during Covid-19 Pandemic. This Beurer Sander kit has been fantastic. Easy to use with more attachments than we could use. Glad we chose to get the wired model vs the rechargeable model because of the length of time needed to file stubborn thick toenails in older persons. this unit has worked beautifully. The rechargeable model may have been more portable to use but may not have been able to withstand the length of continuous use for very thick toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Patty of Arcadia

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an elderly lady who can no longer care for my toenails. I take this pedicure nail set with me when I go to the nail salon and my pedicurist uses it on my nails. She like using it and it does a good job. I have problems with my nails thickening and this nail set takes care of that. I am very glad that I purchased it and appreciate my pedicurist using it on my nails. This does a much better job than the tools they have in the salon.
customer_reviews.author: June J. Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product with lots of attachments
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after having a pedicure in a German spa during which the nail technician used a similar (but more elaborate) device, probably also by Beurer. I was happy with that pedicure, and I am also very happy with this product. The device is solidly built and there are a lot of attachments. I like the fact that the speed can be controlled by pressing a + or - button on the device. You twist the base of the handle to turn it on or off. My one note to potential buyers is that the cord is a bit short (device is not battery-operated).
customer_reviews.author: PW15

customer_reviews.title: Mani Pedi at home!  Saving money!  Professional tool
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this mani pedi tool. With nail salons closed due to Covid 19 restrictions I needed desperately to give my hands a feet a manicure and pedicure but realized without a professional tool like this I would be doing a terrible job. This cleaned up my cuticles, got my nails smooth, got rid of my calluses and more. Now I am ready for polish. Thank you Beurer for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mammoth Lakes hiker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has so many heads. The instructions actually explain what each is used for. I purchased another brand, no instructions. I tried looking online, still no instructions. I like the case, everything had a spot. And the power cord is long
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Best set for the beginners like me!
customer_reviews.text: This 10-pieces set is ALL YOU NEED! As a beginner, I was originally worried about not being able to use this set because I always went to the shop and had techinicians done it for me. After purchasing this set, I found the manicure and pedicure were actuallly not hard to do it myself at all! Most importantly, no matter what angle I used this set, it seemed like it would never hurt my skin even I was a little clumsy at the beginning. It's just simply convenienet and easy to use for the beginners like me!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Best kit for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Omg am I glad I found this kit!! My elderly mother has awful toe nails! Very thick and very hard to cut and impossible to file down until I found this! It’s a lot like what the nail salons use. I found the best clippers on amazon and now I have the best kit to smoothen and round off my moms nails. They’re amazing!! Especially for the price!!! I’m extremely happy with this kit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! Easy to use and has done wonders for my in-grown toenails. Getting professional pedicures done has always been painful for me . They always dig into the sides of my toes to cut the ingrown nails, with this tool I simply file the nails down painlessly 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Lina Valdovinos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous.....works great...love it...all set for my quarentine nail salon...all set...this machine is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: After using battery operated products I needed a quality filing tool that wouldn't break down. This unit is amazing. Fast, comfortable to use, it makes you feel like a princess. Thank you Beurer!
customer_reviews.author: Bonny Bev

customer_reviews.title: Mighty fine product
customer_reviews.text: Used this to keep my toenails in good shape. As a diabetic it is important to keep my feet and nails in good shape. A couple are curved down and are almost impossible to trim. Using this handy tool works great at keeping them from getting ingrown and jagged.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 84 year old mom cuz her feet nails are thick and hard to cut. It took a long time to file them with this. But it worked very well. Maintaining is the key. It does have a smell if u use longer than 20 min so let it rest before u continue. Usually takes 5 minutes per nail. Hopefully it will last long. I’ve used it 6 times already and still works well. I haven’t used most of the attachments so I don’t know how well those work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Nail great nails!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for the perfect mani-pedi device. Look no further! This is it! Easy to use and change heads. Very impressed. Great way to maintain nails especially during the long quarantine we had and the uncertainty of public places like salons. Good to have on hand. NZFREEMAN
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for gel polish and nail removal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this efile as I needed something for nails to remove gel polish and polly gel nails. Only had it a few days and used twice took me 2 hours to remove polish and nails With the bits included. My opinion way to long I could have soaked off faster. But wanted to test this efile out. Tried looking for extra bits to buy but so far no luck on finding any. Probably going to have to purchase another efile.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nails
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very value. I can do my Pedicure and manicure at home any time after shower or late night. Finally I have beautiful nails Every time easy to shape and control. But I prefer if there is a video show how every piece work. Because in the beginning I was confused and afraid to heart my skin.
customer_reviews.author: GHADA

product_meta.title: Beurer MP42 11-piece Professional Manicure & Pedicure Nail Drill Kit | 7 Attachm./Variable Speeds | Electric Nail File Set, Nails Care Tools, For Foot/Hand | Storage Case
product_meta.description: Size:11-PieceAchieve professional fresh from the salon manicures and pedicures right in the comfort of your home with The Beurer Manicure and Pedicure Kit. The powerful nail drill can be used on either natural nails or acrylic nails and fingernails or toenails. The Beurer Manicure and Pedicure Kit comes equipped with seven different high-quality sapphire and felt attachments that can all be easily stored away in the included storage case: 1. The Sapphire Cone – Used for removing dry skin or calluses from the soles and heels of the feet and for manicuring nails. 2. Sapphire Disk with a fine grain texture – Used for filing and treatment of the nails 3. Sapphire Disk with a coarse grain texture – Used for filing and treatment of the nails. 4. Sapphire Callus Rasp – Used for the fast removal of thick or large calluses on the soles and heels of the feet. 5. Flame Milling Cutter – Used for removing ingrown nails on both hands and feet 6. Cylindrical Milling Gutter – Used for the grinding and smoothing of any lignified foot nail surfaces. 7. Felt Cone – Used for smoothing and polishing the edge of nails after filing, as well as for cleaning the nail surface. The Beurer Manicure and Pedicure Set has a sleek ergonomic design with magic-LED display, that only appears during operation, that makes it easy to hold. The set is the perfect tool for achieving a precision nail file every time. Once the device is switched on, you will have the option to select between the two rotation modes; clockwise or anti-clockwise as well as selecting your desired speed between 2,500 – 4,600 rpm ±15%. Apart from the Beurer Manicure and Pedicure Set being continuously adjustable making it easy to use, it is also easy to clean thanks to the included protective cap for any nail dust that will form.
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: for beautiful hands and feet at home - Includes 7 different high-quality attachments and a storage pouch.
EASY TO USE: with flexible clockwise and counterclockwise rotation for ease of use on either hand.
7 HIGH-QUALITY ATTACHMENTS: durable and made from sapphire all stored in a storage case for to conveniently and neatly pack away or take with you.
INTEGRATED LED LIGHT: with LED light that comes on while in usage, To help achieve precise filing.
PREMIUM CARRYING CASE: with a practical storage case, making it easy to put away or take with you.
WE'RE HERE FOR YOU: Our Friendly Florida based team is happy to assist you with whatever questions and support you may need. Our customer service is located right here in the USA!
SPECS: the MP42 has RPM of 2,500 – 4,600 +/- 15%. The speed is fully adjustable & rotations can be selected as clockwise or counterclockwise.
